name: Shape Shifters (CarkoSquared)
description:
Current update: V1.0

A simple 2D platforming game with some cool mechanics! Navigate your way through obstacles by jumping and dashing to reach the end!

CONTROLS:

 Arrow Keys - Movement

  • Space - Jump
  • LShift - Dash
  • Esc - Pause/Resume

expect bugs bc im a beginner lol
